Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • mm19.game.ships.Ship
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DestroyerShip, MainShip, PilotShip

    public abstract class Ship
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Ship(int length, int health)
